name: Shounen Deconstructed
description: Shounen media has changed a lot over the years - or has it? Get to the bottom of what makes shounen SHOUNEN in “Shounen: Deconstructed”!

name: An Introduction to Character Archetypes in Anime & Popular Culture
description: Join the Real Adults as they define and discuss character archetypes in anime and popular culture, and how/why they are used in storytelling.

name: ANIME LIP SYNC BATTLE
description: Back for its 3rd year, it's Anime Lip Sync Battle! Hosted by Agape and Miles, we're ready to show off 10 new songs for you to lip sync for your life! Winner will receive a $25 gift card to Joann's to help your cosplay project! All participants receive a treat as well!

name: Let's Talk Fontaine: Law, France, and Folklore
description: Calling all Genshin Impact Fontaine lovers! Come join us for a discussion about the cultural elements and legal system in Fontaine!

name: Anime Conventions of Years Past
description: Curious about the history of anime conventions like the one you are at right now? Ever wanted to experience what it was like to go to a con at different points in history? Join us on a journey through the rapid evolution of anime conventions and the people who attend them!

name: Bungo Stray Dogs Game Night
description: Come hang with members of the ADA, Port Mafia, and others for some fun sleepover games and stories! Minimal war crimes will be committed, a good time will be had by all!

name: Karaoke
description: Come request your favorites and end the night in song!

name: Cinema of the Rising Sun: How to Get Into Japanese Film
description: Interested in learning more about Japanese culture through its rich history of film? Join us as we show you how to discover your next favorite film!

name: Literary Analysis of Bungo Stray Dogs
description: Have you ever wondered what those old books the BSD characters' abilities are based on are about? Come for a discussion of some famous and possibly great works of literature!

name: Domain Expansion Touchdown: The NFL for Anime Fans
description: Think football is just a boring sportsball for your dad? Think Again! Football is the nerdiest and most anime sport around, and to prove it I'm going to explain it using exclusively Anime references and comparisons.

name: Hey... Do That Again!
description: Execution is everything when you're creating Pink Tsundere #9827.

name: Rating Your OTPs: Ship or Skip?
description: Need someone to harshly judge your favorite pairings from series you love? Come to this panel and watch Petrichor either praise or crush your dreams!

name: Utena Did It First
description: Katy is back and ready to talk about Revolutionary Girl Utena… again! Join her for an hour long dive into the influences Utena had on the anime industry and trends she started.

name: Introduction To One Piece
description: This panel is for individuals interested in the hit anime, manga, and live action series One Piece, but are confused on which adaption to start, and are intimidated by its length. Each adaptation will be reviewed and an overview of the series will be presented.

name: Unsolved “Mister”ies
description: Unsolved “Mister”ies: Sleuths, you are on the case to solve what is the next mystery anime you should watch.  Join us as we investigate popular series, like Bungo Stray Dogs, to figure out what makes this genre alluring.

name: Modern Midoriyama: a History of Ninja Warrior/Sasuke
description: Since the 1990's, Ninja Warrior has grown from a televised obstacle competition, into a globally loved sport, with representations found in various countries. Join us as we explore the history of this sport - the origins, the champions, and how has evolved and adapted into media today!

name: Our Manga Library
description: Want to take a break with a good story? Visit Our Manga Library with over 400 volumes of manga to choose from.
